alert.note: Alert for Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 5:29PM CDT until July 05 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Miami, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Miami. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
